subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Tigers’ lineup has been bolstered by the trades for third baseman Miguel Cabrera and shortstop Édgar Rentería and given more depth with the acquisition of outfielder Jacque Jones.
snippet: The Tigers’ lineup has been bolstered by the trades for third baseman Miguel Cabrera and shortstop Édgar Rentería and given more depth with the acquisition of outfielder Jacque Jones.
